title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite -CH20002Process and mechanical design of Heat Transfer Equipments: Heat Exchangers -with and without phase change (shell and tube / double pipe / other types), Reboilers, Evaporators.Text Book:Books suggested for Heat Transfer (CH20002)Reference Book:1.Chemical Engineers Handbook by R. H. Perry and C. H. Chilton2.Process Equipment Design by L. E. Brownell and Young3.Introduction to Chemical Equipment Design: Mechanical aspects by B. C. Bhattacharya4.Process Equipment Design by M. V. Joshi
